alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 06 at 1:20PM PST until January 11 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM EARLY MONDAY MORNING THROUGH EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations 8 to 14 inches possible with 2 to 3 feet above 9000 feet. Southwest winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...From 4 AM Monday morning through 4 AM PST Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
